attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Must be unique in the rendered view and must match the children's name

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Stores the value of the item selected from the dropdown

attributes.name: leadingIcon
attributes.description: Show an icon to the left of the dropdown option. Non-native only

attributes.name: maxHeight
attributes.description: Maximum height of the dropdown menu items popover. Non-native only

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: The text displayed for the dropdown before a selection is made. Non-native only

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Set an id for the dropdown component.

attributes.name: arialabel
attributes.description: Defines how the selected value will be translated for the screen reader. If not specified it will fall back to the name. If both arialabel and arialabelledby are specified, arialabelledby will be used

attributes.name: arialabelledby
attributes.description: The aria-labelledby attribute identifies the element (or elements) that labels the dropdown it is applied to. Normally it is the id of the label.

attributes.name: native
attributes.description: When true will render the native <select> html element

attributes.name: relative
attributes.description: Set to true if a parent element has a css position of `relative`

attributes.name: filterable
attributes.description: When true, the dropdown will be filterable. Non-native only
